name: Arcane Shield
text: You can convert any spell into a defense.
benefit: As a immediate action, you can sacrifice a prepared spell or unused spell slot of 1st level or higher and gain a deflection bonus to AC equal to the level of the spell or spell slot you sacrificed for 1 round. 0-level spells may not be sacrificed in this manner.
mythicText: You sculpt spells into a powerful, enduring arcane barriers.
mythicBenefit: You add half your tier to the deflection bonus granted to your AC when you use your Arcane Shield. You can expend one use of mythic power when using this feat to extend the duration to a number of rounds equal to your tier.
text_zh: 你能够将任何法术转化为护盾。
prerequisites_zh: 奥术施法者，施法者等级10级。
benefit_zh: 以直觉动作，你能够牺牲一个1环或更高环级的已准备法术或者未使用法术位，并将其转化为AC上的偏斜加值，数值等同于被牺牲的已准备法术或者未使用法术位环级，持续1轮。0环法术无法以此方式牺牲。
mythicText_zh: 你能够将法术塑造成强大、持久的奥术屏障。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用奥能之盾专长时，你可以将自身阶层的一半加到你的AC所获得的偏斜加值上。在使用该专长时，你能够花费1次神话之力来将专长效果的持续时间延长，延长到等同于你的阶层的轮数。
